name: crm-atlas-demo3-pinupstars
description: Atlas Headless CRM MCP tools for the Pin-Up Stars fashion beachwear demo (contacts, products, orders, tickets, stock, loyalty).

tools.name: search_contact
tools.description: Search for contacts/customers by name, email, labels or preferences. Always pass the search query extracted from the user request (e.g. {"query": "Maria Rossi"}).

tools.name: get_contact
tools.description: Retrieve a specific contact by ID with related orders, tickets, tasks and fidelity information.

tools.name: search_product
tools.description: Search the swimwear catalog (bikini, one piece, accessories). Use specific terms like SKU, collection or category.

tools.name: search_order_header
tools.description: Find customer orders (online, retail, wholesale) and inspect payment/shipping status.

tools.name: search_support_ticket
tools.description: Search hierarchical support tickets (returns, exchanges, complaints). Use ticket number or customer name as query.

tools.name: search_stock_item
tools.description: Check product availability across warehouses, stores and resellers. Query using SKU or warehouse name.

tools.name: create_support_ticket
tools.description: Create a new support ticket referencing an existing contact/order. Collect reason, priority and description before calling.

tools.name: create_task
tools.description: Create internal tasks (follow-up, order processing, inventory check) linked to contacts or tickets.
